thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 24 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Techcomp Holdings Says Executive Director Enters Sale & Purchase Agreement

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Techcomp Holdings Says Executive Director Enters Sale & Purchase Agreement
text:
April 25 (Reuters) - Techcomp Holdings Ltd:
* BOARD INFORMED BY EXEC DIRECTOR & GUO BING ON 18 APRIL ABOUT SALE OF 44.4% OF ISSUED SHARE CAPITAL OF CO FOR HK$399.2 MILLION
* GUO ALSO ENTERED SPA IN RELATION TO SALE SHARE OF SHARES REPRESENTING ABOUT 17.2% OF ISSUED SHARE CAPITAL OF CO FOR HK$154.7 MILLION
* APPLICATION HAS BEEN MADE BY CO FOR RESUMPTION OF TRADING IN ITS SHARES ON HONG KONG STOCK EXCHANGE AND SGX-ST ON 25 APRIL 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
